Checks if the Tetromino can be rotated 90 degrees clockwise Copies the shape of the Tetromino and checks if the rotated shape with the same origin would be out of bounds or collide with a locked square TetrisSquare

moveDown() - Method in class tetrisgame.Tetromino
Moves the current Tetromino down by one First check if moving down is in bounds and whether it collides with a locked square If can move down push the origin (topleft) Coord of the Tetro down by one Reassign the squares TetrisSquare occupied by the Tetro according to the new origin If can't be moved further down, lock the Squares of the Tetro
moveLeft() - Method in class tetrisgame.TetrisPanel
Moves the current Tetromino Tetromino to the left.
moveLeft() - Method in class tetrisgame.Tetromino
Moves the Tetromino to the left by one column Wrapped in invokelater Checks if moving left is in bounds or stopped by a locked square If moving left is possible do it, reassign sqaures TetrisSquare
moveRight() - Method in class tetrisgame.TetrisPanel
Moves the current Tetromino to the right.
moveRight() - Method in class tetrisgame.Tetromino
Moves the Tetromino to the right by one column Wrapped in invokelater Checks if moving right is in bounds or stopped by a locked square If moving left is possible do it, reassign sqaures TetrisSquare

paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class tetrisgame.TetrisHUD
Paints the TetrisHUD component, updating the score and next tetromino display.
paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class tetrisgame.TetrisPanel
Overriding the painCompononent method of the JPanel class We paint a filled square for every Tetris square TetrisSquare stored in the Board The squares are coloured to the Color of the corresponding Square The method also draws the lines of the grid after having drawn the squares.
Pause() - Method in class tetrisgame.GameFrame
Pauses the game and displays the pause menu.PauseMenu The menu has options to quit, save and quit or resume

PauseMenu(GameFrame) - Constructor for class tetrisgame.PauseMenu
Constructs the PauseMenu and initializes its components.
pushDown() - Method in class tetrisgame.Tetromino
Pushes the Tetro down as far as possible First we copy the the origin coordinate, and then simulate dropping it down by 1 row while as long as it doesnt hit the bottom or a locked tetro After we find the lowest possible coordinate we set this for the Tetro Height, width and occupied squares need to be recalculated aswell.
pushX(int) - Method in class tetrisgame.Coord
Increases the x-coordinate by the specified offset.
pushY(int) - Method in class tetrisgame.Coord
Increases the y-coordinate by the specified offset.

rotate() - Method in class tetrisgame.Tetromino
Rotates the Tetromino if possible, determined by canRotate() method Wrapped in swingutilites.invokelater to ensure that its thread safe with the gameloop With rotation the occupied squares, width and height of the Tetromino also changes, these are reassigned after rotation
rotateClock() - Method in class tetrisgame.TetroShape
Rotates the shape clockwise by transforming its relative coordinates.
rotateTetro() - Method in class tetrisgame.TetrisPanel
Rotates the current Tetromino clockwise.
